name: GitHub Connector
description: Enables AI to interact with GitHub repositories, manage issues, and pull requests.

name: Slack Notifier
description: Allows AI to send messages and notifications to Slack channels.

name: JSON Parser
description: Parses and validates JSON data structures.

name: Google Drive Access
description: Provides AI with access to Google Drive files and folders.

name: PostgreSQL Client
description: Connects AI to PostgreSQL databases for querying and data manipulation.

name: Fetch API
description: Allows AI to retrieve data from specified web URLs.

name: File System Access
description: Grants AI the ability to read and write local files.

name: OpenAI Connector
description: Integrates AI with OpenAI's API for advanced language processing.

name: Microsoft 365 Suite
description: Connects AI to Microsoft 365 services like Outlook and OneDrive.

name: Puppeteer Browser
description: Enables AI to automate and interact with web pages using Puppeteer.

name: Gmail Access
description: Allows AI to read and send emails through Gmail.

name: Docker Client
description: Connects AI to Docker for container management and orchestration.

name: Website Monitor
description: Monitors websites for changes or downtime.

name: Toolchain Runner
description: Executes multi-step tasks by chaining compatible tools.

name: Web Scraper
description: Extracts data from web pages using selectors or patterns.

name: Summary Engine
description: Summarizes text content, emails, or documents intelligently.

name: Auth Checker
description: Verifies authentication credentials and access permissions.

name: CI Monitor
description: Watches CI pipelines and triggers alerts on failures.

name: Chart Generator
description: Creates pie, bar, and line charts from structured data.
